meanings: (목숨이 끊어지다) die (of/from); (완곡한 표현) pass away[on]; (타인에 의해) be killed, (literary) expire, (literary) perish, (lite...

vlive.korean: [판타지 따라하는 이재윤 귀여워서 89번째 죽었고] 맨날 켤까 생각 중이긴 해요. [Jae Yoon imitating FANTASY is cute] I'm thinking of turning it on every day. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SF9] 이재윤이 너무 귀여운게 고민이에요...🤦🏻‍♀️ (Jaeyoon asking for advice)
vlive.english: [Jae Yoon imitating FANTASY is cute] I'm thinking of turning it on every day.

vlive.korean: [안 알려줌, 갑자기 훅 들어온 제작진 떠보기] 의사 죽었고 시민이겠지? 의사니까? [Asking to the staffers but not being able to get an answer] The doctor is dead. Then, a citizen? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.72
vlive.english: [Asking to the staffers but not being able to get an answer] The doctor is dead. Then, a citizen?

vlive.korean: 도연이는 죽었고 이제 다시 빨리 진행 해 줘. Do-yeon is dead. Let's keep it going. 듣기 View video Amigo TV : 아미고tv I.O.I편 앙순이들의 미리 메리크리스마스 Ep.03 [3/3]
vlive.english: Do-yeon is dead. Let's keep it going.

vlive.korean: 일단 죽어. -도연이 죽었고. Let's kill her first. - Do-yeon is dead. 듣기 View video JTBC PLUS : [Replay][AmigoTV] Late night snack talk with I.O.I all together
vlive.english: Let's kill her first. - Do-yeon is dead.

vlive.korean: 다 찬성하죠? -여러분, 경주에서 봐요. -도연이 죽었고. Everyone agreed. - See you in Gyeongju. - She's dead. 듣기 View video JTBC PLUS : [Replay][AmigoTV] Late night snack talk with I.O.I all together
vlive.english: Everyone agreed. - See you in Gyeongju. - She's dead.

examples.korean: He’s dead and it’s no use wishing him alive again. 발음듣기 그는 죽었고 그가 다시 살아나기를 바래 봐야 소용이 없어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He’s dead and it’s no use wishing him alive again. 발음

examples.korean: When the police finally gained control of the city, 171 people were dead and hundreds more were injured. 발음듣기 경찰이 마침내 시의 통제력을 되찾게 되었을 때는, 171명이 죽었고 수 백 명 이상이 부상을 입었다. Neungyule
examples.english: When the police finally gained control of the city, 171 people were dead and hundreds more were injured. 발음

examples.korean: The deluge has claimed more than 850 lives and displaced more than a quarter of the people in Bangladesh. 발음듣기 그 홍수로 인해 방글라데시에서 850명 이상이 죽었고, 4분의 1의 이상의 인구가 이동했다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The deluge has claimed more than 850 lives and displaced more than a quarter of the people in Bangladesh. 발음

examples.korean: Her mother is dead and her father is married to a wicked stepmother. 발음듣기 그녀의 엄마는 죽었고 그녀의 아빠는 사악한 계모와 결혼했다. Neungyule
examples.english: Her mother is dead and her father is married to a wicked stepmother. 발음

examples.korean: Her husband died early and she remained single for the rest of her life. 발음듣기 그녀의 남편은 일찍 죽었고, 그녀는 여생을 혼자 지냈다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her husband died early and she remained single for the rest of her life. 발음
